title: Chennai Vada Chennai Madras Lyrics Madras Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Madras
Singer(s): Â Hariharasudhan, Meenakshi Iyer
Movie: Madras (2014)
Music: Santhosh Narayanan
Lyrics: Kabilan

Chennai vada chennai , Chennai vada chennai
indha karuppar thamizh manna, karuppar thamizh manna
yaaro isaippaaro, chennai vada chennai
enga vera asaippaaro, vera asaippaaro

Enga ooru madras-u
idhukku naanga thaaney address-u. (2)
Chennai vada chennai
karuppar thamizh manna

Mullu thatcha koottukulla
kaakkaa kunjaa vazndhaa kooda
palli koodam pulla pola thulli kudhippom.

Mottamaadi mela naanga
thotti chedi pola ellaam kottamaaga
koodi vazhum kaattu maramthaan.

Ribbon building high courtellaam
sengalum mattumalla
engaloda raththamum serndhirukkudaa.

Kattupaadu pottu neenga
engalaththaan katti vacha
sattimolam pola naanga saththam poduvom.

Kavala kadhava odaikkum
karuviyaa iruppom.
ada irukkum idaththil irundhe
paravayaa parappom. (2)

Enga ooru madras-u
idhukku naanga thaaney address-u. (2)

Kamarukattu kannukaari thimirukittu pogumpodhu
amarankitta sonna kadhal kondaattamthaan.

Kaal pandhu kuththu sanda
carompodu kapadi ellaam
engaloda veeram sollu vilayattuthaan.

Band-u saththam, tape-u saththanm
gaana paaattu kaadha suththum
aaga moththam vazhuvomey idaiyoduthan.

Poster otti pandhal pottum
koottam kootti ottu pottum
yemaattramey enga panpaaduthaan.

Uzhaikkum inamey ulagai
jeithidum oru naal.
viliththu irundhaal viraivil
varumey andha thirunaal. (2)

Enga ooru madras-u
idhukku naanga thaaney address-u. (2)

Chennai vada chennai , Chennai vada chennai
indha karuppar thamizh manna, karuppar thamizh manna
yaaro isaippaaro, chennai vada chennai
enga vera asaippaaro, vera asaippaaro

Enga ooru madras-u
idhukku naanga thaaney address-u. (2)
